Trade/Device Name(s): On Call Express Pro Blood Glucose Monitoring System
On Call Express Pro Blood Glucose Meter
On Call Express Pro Blood Glucose Test Strips
On Call Express Pro Glucose Control Solution
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): On Call Express Pro Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for On Call Express Pro Blood Glucose Monitoring System using amperometric detection to quantify glucose in capillary whole blood at multiple patient settings
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips, forearm, and palm; for multiple patient use by health care professionals in health care facilities as an aid to monitoring diabetes control programs (not for diagnosis, screening, or use on neonates).
